Came to this spot for the first time and Tried the spaghetti verde con bistec and it was delicious!!! I really recommend it and the staff is great. Will definitely come back!

Ordered from here and they have old dry Whole Chicken! Expensive and has old taste! There are other good Peruvian restaurants and with amazing flavor. Don‚Äôt waste your time and money here! Save yourself the trip

Roast chicken. Chaufa. Delicious.
Great Peruvian food. Cozy atmosphere. The prices are a bit higher than some other sit down restaurants but it‚Äôs high quality food.

Las chicas son muy amables, es un lugar que vamos muy seguido, la atenci√≥n es excelente, se siente muy familiar y acogedor. Todo exquisito.

I‚Äôve been eating at this restaurant for over 20 years. ( I had a different name before) The food is delicious. The service is great. We became good friends with the owners and workers, I recommend anybody that want to eat is delicious Peruvian dishes

I wanted Peruvian food and I found this restaurant on the internet, unfortunately the food was not the best. I have tried Peruvian food and I know that it is one of the best cuisines in the world. This place has a lot to improve, the flavor, the seasoning and the quality of the food is quite poor. the fried rice and the chicken poor in flavor, the yuca hard as a stone, the salad with too much oil. very bad experience in this place. They need a new chef asap!!
Nasty attitude
The chicken was uncooked, and it did not taste good
La comida es excelente, pero el pollo asado es el mejor de cualquier otro lugar , Gracias Per√∫
Super limpio, comida muy sabrosa üòâ,  100% recomendado
Exelente comida.

This place is so amazing, was here for a short weekend trip and it was close to our Airbnb - photos are the calamari (highly recommended) it came with super crispy yucca fries to die for & the entre I got was steak, papas, plantains and egg. Everything was perfect and the staff was so friendly

Very small restaurant, but who cares. Took a little while to get the food, but also, who cares. The food was absolutely delicious. The Lomo meat was tender, not chewy, arroz Chaufa very flavorful. Highly recommend.
Food was outstanding.  The Lomo Saltado was great, along with the Bistec con Tallarines Verdes.

Wow, great food I love it. The Peruvian food that ate here makes me want to go back for more and more. I recommend it.

The food was delicious.(ceviche /lomo saltado )excellent service ..I would recommend.

Authentic Peruvian food taste. Great portions too. Place is very small, probably 20 people or less fit. Service was ok, not too great and not too bad either. We ordered Seco De Cabrito, Tallarines Verdes con Biste, Salchipapas, Ceviche de pescado solamente y Chichas Lime√±as con Inka Colas. 100 Dollars with service included and Tax.

Needs work on the SERVICE . I went and ordered Papa a la Huancaina , Jalea , and Chicken Broth Soup. I came with 2 other people. The waitress comes and serves my two friends water and I received no water or any utensils ( my friends did) . So I waited , after 10 minutes I had to ask the owner. ( The owner always sticks around ). I won‚Äôt lie , Food is delicious but, the way they served it needs work. ( For those true Jalea fans , always check the food beforehand). ( Vegans out there , check your lettuce and veggies beforehand) . I had a little dilemma with the food but gladly , the owner came and talked to us and helped us resolve the situation. **{ To The owner, Money was not the problem but your presentation on how your food was served was not right. By the way this was His Comment when I addressed the food issue ‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Äù OH THAT HAPPENS ONCE OR TWICE A YEAR BUT ITS NOTHING ‚Äú‚Ä¢‚Ä¢  So Your Telling Me Because I‚Äôm Not A Food Inspector or Someone Special, That I Shouldn‚Äôt Receive Well Prepared Food ?

Overall they need to improve on some areas , But I Will Be Back , And With A Food Inspector. ( Maybe then I‚Äôll give a better review)

The food was so delicious! Avocado salad, the rice, maduros, and of course the chicken--  all so tasty. I went to meet friends there and even though I live in Brooklyn, I'm pretty sure I'll make the long trip there again for the tasty Peruvian food. Also, it's family owned, small staff, very intimate and warm environment. Loved it.
Muy rico, la primera vez en u restaurante peruano, la chica muy amable y te ayuda si no sabes que escoger.

Better than many Peruvian spots.

You sense a touch of extra care in all the dishes they do here. Very very tasty!!!

Update: 3/2019 After returning to enjoy some spectacular food, I was very disappointed a felt something was off. Didn't seem like same quality as before and their green sauce was EXTREMELY salty!! Hopefully they fix this. Changing 5 star to 3

PS if you made it to the end don't forget to hit the like button
Horrible. 25usd por caldo peque√±ito y arroz. Ni recomiendo  que hagan delivery  dicen 30min. Y se demoraron  1hr.

It's the first time we went there. We ordered lomo saltado and it was really great. We will definitely go next time to try other dishes. The only thing we would ask is that you could add more juice to the lomo saltado that's why 4 stars but‚Ä¶

My Family really love the food in this restaurant but unfortunately I gave 2stars because the service isn't good. The first time we thinked may be because they were so busy wasn't good service but after that couple times happened the same‚Ä¶

I'm totally coming back here again. They got delicious alfajordes and Pollo la brasa. But I think their arroz chifa is good. I don't recommend the rice with vegetables, that tasted very bland.Oh I recommend paying in cash only because it took a very long time for their credit card machines to process :( Overall good foodm

If you never had a Peruvian dish I would recommend this place. My wife is from Peru and she took me here and it was the first time I ever had Peruvian food and it was great..we have decide to make it one of our places we go to eat.on a regular basis.
Deliciosa comida y lugar muy limpio, Les recomiendo buena atenci√≥n.

Excelente comida peruana en New York!!!
Great place, excellent service!!!
Try the Chupe de Camarones! It is even better than the one I tried the last time I was Lima. Ceviche is also delicious and so is the Jalea (fried seafood).
Deliciosa comida peruana.....Excelentr servicio
Excellent!! 5 stars hands down! The food is delicious, service is great...sangria was the best! My husband & I loved it and our children did as well (they give 2 thumbs up)!!
Delicious authentic Peruvian food.  The staff is super nice and they are always making sure we have everything we need and that the food is at its best. Every time I go, the food is great!
The best roast chicken in corona queens ,clean and quiet place , employees who serve you kindly! And the most important thing , very very low price! You are not going to regret!
Great service! Very tasty food. We had ceviche*, anticucho* and the famous chicken(pollo a la brasa) juicy and tender.over all we had an excellent time at costa verde! Service is the best!
I went in and order peruvian chicken and french fries and it was delicious! i just waited for like 6-8 minutes which is fast and the cashier was also nice. Highly recommended!
If you are in a rush no time to cook this is a good place they have the juiciest roast chicken not hard or dry like others I have tasted. Their platains are good too.

Great food and excellent service every time I go there when visiting NYC. I have tried a large variety of Peruvian dishes such as Ceviche, Aji de Gallina, Lomo Saltado, and fried fish. Their Arroz Chaufa (Peruvian Style fried rice) is very‚Ä¶
The food was okay and service not to good. We ordered grilled beef and they came out with grilled chicken. Horrible expierence.
Cada vez que visito Queens con mi familia desde Florida Costa Verde es el lugar de preferencia. La comida muy sabrosa pero que pena que ya no este en el menu tallarin saltado estilo chifa.
Lomo saltado is good but the restaurant is a little pricey, amount of food serve is average, they also have delivery fees which I consider not fair because you end up paying $20 for 1 dishüòè‚Ä¶

If I could give it no stars, I would. How is it that I order from you, wait for a hour, call you and tell me that there's too many orders and to wait 20 minutes more?! Couldn't you call me to let me know that it was going to take longer? I don't understand. I think that's very unprofessional and won't order from here again.

Great peruvian food it's been a while since I found a place that makes great tasting peruvian food 100% recommend this restaurant
